sentences.en: Atomic weapons are forbidden because of their hugely destructive effects.
sentences.cn: 原子武器由于具有极大的破坏性而被禁用.

sentences.en: Both tasks, he said are hugely difficult for a computer.
sentences.cn: 两者的工作, 他说为了一部计算机巨大困难.

sentences.en: But last year was hugely stressful for big car firms.
sentences.cn: 但去年大型汽车公司非常的有压力.

sentences.en: China has been hugely successful in efforts to reform its criminals.
sentences.cn: 中国改造罪犯的工作取得了巨大的成就.

sentences.en: Earning all that through my own efforts hugely satisfying.
sentences.cn: 凭自己的努力赚到那些钱,为我带来了巨大的满足感.

sentences.en: I think she was hugely embarrassed by the whole scene.
sentences.cn: 我认为整个场面让她极其尴尬。

sentences.en: It is sticky, dirty, chaotic and hugely expensive for visitors.
sentences.cn: 在造访者看来,这里闷热 、 肮脏 、 混乱、物价非常昂贵.

sentences.en: Nearly everyone shared Paine's belief that the struggle was hugely important.
sentences.cn: 几乎人人都和派恩一样相信那场斗争非常重要.

sentences.en: She seemed to be enjoying herself hugely.

sentences.cn: 她不惧权威，幽默风趣，很受欢迎。

sentences.en: South Africans, white and black, are hugely proud of their achievement.
sentences.cn: 无论白人和黑人, 南非人民都为自己的成就深感自豪.

sentences.en: The others seemed to find my discomfort hugely entertaining.
sentences.cn: 我觉得很尴尬,其他人却似乎觉得这非常有趣.

sentences.en: These applications are free and on the Web hugely popular products product.
sentences.cn: 这些应用软件全部免费且发布在网页上.

sentences.en: They compete with Microsoft office Office, a hugely popular product.
sentences.cn: 他们和微软竞争.很大的流行的产品.

sentences.en: They intended to invest hugely in new technology.
sentences.cn: 他们打算在新技术方面投入大量资金。
